title: Civic Office of West Ardougne

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Civic Office of West Ardougne is the main governmental building in West Ardougne. It is run by Bravek and also contains the Clerk. The building features into the Plague City quest, in which the player delivers the hangover cure to Bravek.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Civic Office of West ArdougneThe RuneScape Classic Wiki also has an article on: classicrsw:Civic Office of West Ardougne
Civic Office of West Ardougne
Released27 August 2002 (Update)
MembersYes
LocationWest Ardougne
Map
Advanced data
Typebuilding

The Civic Office of West Ardougne is the main governmental building in West Ardougne. It is run by Bravek and also contains the Clerk. The building features into the Plague City quest, in which the player delivers the hangover cure to Bravek.
